content:
On https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/92692#issuecomment-1013968235 I sent @bors r- because someone found an issue with the PR while it was pending in bors.

I fixed the issue, and tried @bors r=GuillaumeGomez and @bors r+, but bors no longer seems to be responding. Any idea what's up?

This is more of question for #t-infra. It happens that sometimes bors forget about a PR (see #91359 just 8 hours ago).
The solution: close and reopen the PR, you should be able after that to re-approve it.
